categories: Vault Ice Clipper Ice Screw Racking Device
description: No fumbling, just strong, secure racking of your ice screws. Use it to rack your tools on the descent as well. To attach it to your harness you'll need a flat-head screwdriver and a few seconds of time.Made of aluminum for strength and torsional rigidity.Low-profile nose for a clean catch and release.Compatible with ice clipper slots on most harnesses.Max webbing size is 45 x 3mm.Gate opening is 23mm.Not a load-bearing device or for bearing dynamic forces.
name: DMM Vault Ice Clipper Ice Screw Racking Device
